Reviews.Title: “Poor service, horrible breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Daisy X
Reviews.Content: My room is 114. The room was clean and internet was solid . However staff in this hotel seem have no sense of service. I took a shower before going to bed in the night. There was only 1/4 water came from shower and the rest kept flowing through the tap. Thinking that I only spent overnight and it was late, I finished my shower with a kind of high temperature due to less water came out. Then I heard the alarm in my room ringing loudly. I asked help from receptionist and she said it was because of too much vapor that the smoke alarm detected. The hotel engineer came to fix it. I asked why only my alarm rang but not others , the female superivsor with long hair said probably only I used such high water temperature for shower. Seemed that I brought her a lot of trouble. If the shower system works well, will the alarm ring? By the way, breakfast in this hotel was horrible and no staff replenish if no guest asked. Will stay away from this E. 21 st. La Quinta.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Ashleyhurley
Reviews.Content: Quiet, clean, and excellent value for the price. Breakfast was perfect and with free Internet such a great deal. Employees are friendly and go beyond good service. I would deffinately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Better than first impression”
Reviews.Author: scorpio5
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed here for a big swim meet this past weekend for 3 nights. We had the king suite (rm 201) reserved. When we got there about 1/2 hour before check-in, the room wasn't ready, so we ate at Red Lobster. I have to tell you, as I told the front desk person, I almost bolted on the reservation right then! The building is run-down looking, and I just got a bad vibe. That being said, because of the state fair, a triathalon, and this huge multi-state swim meet, rooms were in short supply in the city, so we checked in. Our suite was very nice, no smells, clean, spacious and well laid out. It is conveniently located to restaurants and a shopping mall (Washington Square). You also have access to the amenities at the Marriott next door, which has a nice pool area and patio. The breakfast was good, too. Overall a good stay!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible stay”
Reviews.Author: mak591
Reviews.Content: Would not recommend this hotel at all. Walls are paper thin. Entire place smells like cigarette smoke, even the "non-smoking" rooms. We had to check out after one day because the smoke smell made my husband's asthma act up. Then to top it off, they charged us for the 2nd day, even though we checked out before noon which we were told by the front desk staff we wouldn't be charged because we had checked out before noon. We ended up getting 2 rooms at the Wyndam which cost the same but were much nicer!

Reviews.Title: “NO SPEED CHANNEL”
Reviews.Author: motorsportguy
Reviews.Content: Hotel in Indianapolis with NO SPEED CHANNEL. Breakfast area is so small. Hallways smells bad Room was clean.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service and ok for the price, but barely”
Reviews.Author: ichor
Reviews.Content: Possibly horrendous stay was saved by great front desk clerk named Natasha. First room I got smelled like armpit. I tried for 30 minutes to sleep there, but then I got freaked out thinking that my clothes and I would emerge the next morning smelling like armpit, so I asked to change rooms. Desk attendant apologized and promptly changed rooms for me. So thanks, lady! The hallways smelled of smoke. The second room I got was fine. No problems. But that first room... it shouldn't be released to a traveler even a third world country. Location of hotel very convenient to city and highways. Denny's and Steak & Shake next door was nice too.

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad hotel but needs some work.”
Reviews.Author: KaosK
Reviews.Content: We stopped here on our trip to North Carolina this year. The hotel is OK but does need some repair. The front desk clerk was great and funny. She took good care of us. The room was clear but smelled a bit. Otherwise the stay was ok.

Reviews.Title: “Night before early airport depature”
Reviews.Author: cceaglen
Reviews.Content: Night time desk clerk was a bit flippant, but other than that. Free parking for our trip and took the shuttle to the airport.. It was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: “OK experience”
Reviews.Author: suzy76
Reviews.Content: i was there with my husband and toddler for 5 nights. The rooms were clean and comfortable, and the staff very friendly. The location is out of the way for downtown Indianapolis, but it is also cheaper than hotels downtown. There is construction being done to one of the interstate access routes to the hotel (I-70), so getting to and from there could get a little bit complicated initially. But the hotel has useful leaflets explaining alternative routes, and these made travelling much easier. The pool was murky, and the external grounds looked like it needed a pick-me-up. The Marriott next door is building some new facilities, and the construction work added to the dodgy look of the surrounding area. However, a note from La Quinta said that once the Marriott facility is up and running, La Quinta guests would be able to access and use it, so things could look rather different in a years' time. The breakfast was so-so, but there is an inexpensive restaurant on the grounds of the hotel. It serves all day breakfasts, in addition to a dinner menu. The food is not bad, so we found ourselves eating there quite a bit. Overall, we didn't have problems with the hotel and had a comfortable stay. But we may prefer to stay closer downtown next time.

Reviews.Title: “The Bad & the Good”
Reviews.Author: Marilynn76
Reviews.Content: Bad: -This hotel has been supposedly renovated but still looks worn and run-down. -Icky cigarette smoke smell in upper floor hallways. -Extremely thin walls. -Right next to the freeway. -A bit pricey for what you get, and it especially sucked that we were charged significantly extra on a couple of nights because of the Grand Prix. Good: -Breakfast is free, tasty, and huge variety. -Very friendly front desk staff. -Comfortable bed. -Lots of dining options/gas/convenience stores in immediate area. -Lots of trees around the hotel. -Room had its own separate closet w/doors, iron, hairdryer, and toiletries, and lots of channels on the TV. -Nice water pressure in shower.

Reviews.Title: “Very dirty and old”
Reviews.Author: Alidost
Reviews.Content: If you care about your health and the health of your family, do not stay here. We paid about $90 for a double queen room that was filthy with broken heater. The mattress was old and noisy, we woke up with back ache. The floor was not vaccumed, and the entire place smelled. We complained but received no attention or refund or discount. Then complained through the website, and other than an automated response, we didn't hear anything.

Reviews.Title: “Rooms are clean, but have thin walls”
Reviews.Author: KD2
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for a soccer tournament. Hotel enforced 14 day cancellation policy and 2-night minimum with no flexibility. Some families only needed 1 night and hotel staff said that they would be charged for 2 nights regardless. Rooms were clean. The TV had many channels including HBO. The heater/AC was newer (digital) and worked well. The doors and walls were thin and you could hear everything that went on in the hallways. Don't get a room by the icemaker! Breakfast was very good with make your own waffles. Staff was generally helpful with hospitality, directions, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Super Comfortable Beds!”
Reviews.Author: SongofSongs
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very clean, the beds were so comfortable -- even our teenage son commented on them. Location is in a good neighborhood -- primarily a business district. Staff was quite friendly and happy to accommodate us for a later check-out time. The lobby and lower level are smoke free. We would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for a great price!”
Reviews.Author: ohiomurph
Reviews.Content: The rooms are clean, the buffet breakfast is good and the front desk staff are friendly and attentive. Nothing fancy but the rooms were clean and comfortable. Highly recommend!

HotelInfo.Name: La Quinta Inn Indianapolis East
HotelInfo.Address: 7304 East 21st Street, Indianapolis, IN 46219
